title: 2-13-17 Sue Pfau, Marilyn Foreman, Jacquie Gering, and myself for a Q&A on Sloan's Talk show for American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
I love discovering how clever and resourceful designers are. Sue Pfau of Sweet Jane Quilting has a book with 12 project sure to make you swoon over precuts! And Her story about how you landed on this is great! Anyone can be successful with a little formula in their pocket.
https://www.instagram.com/sweetjanequilts/
==============
I’m so happy to chat with Jacquie Gering again! If I can point to one person that has influenced how I think about machine quilting in the last couple of years, it is Jacquie’s walking foot quilting. She has showed you in her craftsy classes and now she has a beautiful and information packed teaching book called ‘Walk’. We are going to get a peek at how she thinks about using the walking foot to quilt.. hint.. not in the ditch!
www.jacquiegering.com/ 
===============
I know a LOT of you own a Twister ruler, today I have one of the company owners, Marilyn Foreman, here to talk to me about how she used the ruler then bought the business! Plus she has some tips for you on them.
www.twistersistersdesigns.com/
=============
Q&A with Pat -I want to share about the Moda All Star book projects, the new Moda Challenge and a Q&A Where I have some really interesting questions to answer.. like 'I can't seem to find my style' and 'how to shop for what you will really use'.. oh my.. I think i see all of you nodding your heads!
================
visit American Patchwork & Quilting at http://allpeoplequilt.com
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/apqmagazine
Visit host Pat Sloan at http://www.patsloan.com
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
